foreignData.name: Chor der Gezeiten
foreignData.text:
Fliegend
Heroisch — Immer wenn du einen Zauberspruch wirkst, der den Chor der Gezeiten als Ziel hat, wende Hellsicht 1 an. (Betrachte für Hellsicht 1 die oberste Karte deiner Bibliothek, dann kannst du diese Karte unter deine Bibliothek legen.)

foreignData.name: Coristas de la marea
foreignData.text:
Vuela.
Heroísmo — Siempre que lances un hechizo que haga objetivo a las Coristas de la marea, adivina 1. (Para adivinar 1, mira la primera carta de tu biblioteca, luego puedes poner esa carta en el fondo de tu biblioteca.)

foreignData.name: Chœur des marées
foreignData.text:
Vol
Héroïque — À chaque fois que vous lancez un sort qui cible le Chœur des marées, regard 1. (Pour appliquer regard 1, regardez la carte du dessus de votre bibliothèque. Vous pouvez mettre cette carte au-dessous de votre bibliothèque.)

foreignData.name: Coro delle Maree
foreignData.text:
Volare
Eroismo — Ogniqualvolta lanci una magia che bersaglia il Coro delle Maree, profetizza 1. (Per profetizzare 1, guarda la prima carta del tuo grimorio, poi puoi metterla in fondo al tuo grimorio.)

foreignData.name: 潮流の合唱者
foreignData.text:
飛行
英雄的 ― あなたが潮流の合唱者を対象とする呪文を１つ唱えるたび、占術１を行う。（占術１を行うには、あなたのライブラリーの一番上のカードを見る。その後そのカードをあなたのライブラリーの一番下に置いてもよい。）
foreignData.type: クリーチャー — セイレーン

foreignData.name: 파도의 합창단
foreignData.text:
비행
영웅 — 당신이 파도의 합창단을 목표로 주문을 발동할 때마다, 점술 1을 한다. (점술 1을 하려면 당신의 서고 맨 위의 카드 한 장을 본다. 당신은 그 카드를 당신의 서고 맨 밑에 놓을 수 있다.)

foreignData.name: Coro das Marés
foreignData.text:
Voar
Heroico — Toda vez que você conjurar uma mágica cujo alvo seja Coro das Marés, use vidência 1. (Para usar vidência 1, olhe o card do topo de seu grimório. Depois, você pode colocar aquele card no fundo de seu grimório.)

foreignData.name: Хор Приливов
foreignData.text:
Полет
Героизм — Каждый раз, когда вы разыгрываете заклинание, целью которого является Хор Приливов, предскажите 1. (Чтобы предсказать 1, посмотрите верхнюю карту вашей библиотеки, затем вы можете положить ту карту в низ вашей библиотеки.)

foreignData.name: 浪潮韵集
foreignData.text:
飞行
勇行～每当你施放一个以浪潮韵集为目标的咒语时，占卜1。（占卜1的流程是检视你牌库顶的牌，然后你可以将该牌置于你的牌库底。）

foreignData.name: 浪潮韻集
foreignData.text:
飛行
勇行～每當你施放一個以浪潮韻集為目標的咒語時，占卜1。（占卜1的流程是檢視你牌庫頂的牌，然後你可以將該牌置於你的牌庫底。）

name: Chorus of the Tides
originalText:
Flying
Heroic — Whenever you cast a spell that targets Chorus of the Tides, scry 1. (To scry 1, look at the top card of your library, then you may put that card on the bottom of your library.)

rulings.text: Heroic abilities will resolve before the spell that caused them to trigger.
Heroic abilities will trigger only once per spell, even if that spell targets the creature with the heroic ability multiple times.
Heroic abilities won’t trigger when a copy of a spell is created on the stack or when a spell’s targets are changed to include a creature with a heroic ability.

When you scry, you may put all the cards you look at back on top of your library, you may put all of those cards on the bottom of your library, or you may put some of those cards on top and the rest of them on the bottom.
You choose how to order cards returned to your library after scrying no matter where you put them.
You perform the actions stated on a card in sequence. For some spells and abilities, that means you’ll scry last. For others, that means you’ll scry and then perform other actions.

Scry appears on some spells and abilities with one or more targets. If all of the spell or ability’s targets are illegal when it tries to resolve, it won’t resolve and none of its effects will happen. You won’t scry.

text:
Flying
Heroic — Whenever you cast a spell that targets Chorus of the Tides, scry 1. (To scry 1, look at the top card of your library, then you may put that card on the bottom of your library.)
